documents.document: Reading our spineless PMs comments in the stuff article. What a gutless coward. Remind me again why @BillEnglishMP thinks he’s a good PM?
@LewSOS Farrar’s finally delivered the polling results then?
@Evinshir @pmbillenglish I want him to condemn it, but I’d like him to express our government’s position either way. Saying nothing is weak.
On issues with international importance Bill should either make a statement, or concede he isn’t ready for the responsibility & stand down.
Bill English was handed being leader of the country, and wants to win that role later this year. The job comes with responsibility.
Has our feckless PM made any comment about Trump’s Muslim ban yet or is David Farrar still polling on what he should say?
@jowrotethis No kidding huh. Some folk seem to think if Trump gets impeached the crazy would decrease. Pence is worse, he’s a true believer.
@missgracenz that’s not tiny! Golden Bay Air have one with only 5 seats, one person gets to sit beside the pilot :)
@teradar will they let you have a hoon on the BB guns at the side shows after you’ve drunk all that? A&P shows are the best huh?!
@Sdoull Shakib al Hasan still, surely? Double ton after being put in to bat, outweighs all the bowling efforts. A KW ton pushes him close.
@iainobrien feck, would you want to play on if he’s rushed to A&E in the ambulance?
So, @lakestreetdive are pretty feckin’ phenomenal live!
@myleftkidney asking cos I think I remember you tweeting about their sauces once.. (I blame the 3x mojitre)
@myleftkidney you tried culley’s chipotle corn chips before? Epic. https://t.co/kCzFFc1lSM
@myleftkidney was that the video where the head sharpener tests the blade by cutting into his thumb nail?
@GrowFromHereNZ I think some of the time it is, there may be a fee I’m not sure. They post on Facebook what is happening week to week.
@ThisIsPPM @JuddApatow @realDonaldTrump is he though? Without his tax returns you don’t know what he’s worth or to whom he owes.
@GrowFromHereNZ canine solutions in Seaview has a big indoors doggy area.
@XTOTL wait, Te Awanga Hall, Te Awanga, Hawkes Bay? We’re over in Haumoana at the moment :)
I’m the only person awake so far on Boxing Day. Pup not impressed. https://t.co/qpGiSX2tW2
@paulbrislen or it might possibly be better, will decide after 2nd, 3rd, 4th & 5th viewings.
@MattNippert Rogue One is pretty good though huh? Up there with Empire for me.
@alisonhaislip best wishes to your livers from 2 listeners down here in Middle Earth!
@altonbrown lol, please excuse my phones auto-correct :-)
@altonbrown the Peking fuck are ok but weird, I think the cheese & black pepper just out of pic on the left were good.
@stevebiddle @NZTAWgtn @GrowFromHereNZ I dunno, it’s been a massive boon in the arvo if you live j-ville north on SH1 :)
@altonbrown I’m not in Auckland but the best cheap eats from around the world are in Mercury Plaza I’ve been told.
@metlinkwgtn evening! How come the KPL trains are going so slowly through Tawa, in the tunnels & alongside the motorway in to Welly?
@MiramarMike so closer to Te Awanga or up around Clive might be ok? Cheers!
Thought I was pro at googling but failing to find any info on whether Haumoana has any swimmable beaches. How will I cook down this summer?!
@chetibby or read Dirty Politics.
@simonbwilson is the story following local body (esp Wgtn) and by-election that Labour’s got (ground) game? And it works.
@richardboock you’d think McMillan was the aussie’s batting coach, not ours ;)
This commentary pairing is god awful. #blackcaps #shutuppup
@johubris is that a border terrier?
@MiramarMike do they still have a vege nasi goreng for $6.50?
@MiramarMike that looks like the Oaks Satay Noodle House
@farmgeek ever been tempted by a rocket mass stove? Mac would probably be a decent fuel for one of those! (No idea if allowed in NZ).
@farmgeek does macrocarpa have similar creosote buildups to pine when burnt?
Conclusive evidence? No hot spot, snicko only matches hit on elbow. Robbed. #blackcaps
@publicaddress unbelievable huh! And Sexton’s swinging arm with initial contact to the head goes completely unpunished!
@Naly_D tried giving the tenancy tribunal folk a call for advice? Do @rentersunited know what tenants can do in this sort of situation?
@sumostevenson have to wonder what they’re expecting Cane to do there. Even if he just stood still Henshaw would fall onto his upper torso.
Great 50 given the calibre of batsmen falling around him & who got nowhere earlier in the day! #blackcaps #jeetraval
@ChrisKeall depends if you’re talking about the province bit or the water bit. So,both.
@chetibby I think a lot of the buildings up that way might be all of a similar vintage.
Weird weather event just blew past the northern end of Tawa. 20-30 seconds of incredibly strong northerly wind. Then perfectly still.
@XTOTL read the day the costumes stuck today - love it, looks like my niece gets a book for chrimbo :)
@lewsos I guess if we consider this election part of a trend, then we might want to make that very, very soon :)
@keith_ng and by plenty too!
@davemeltzerWON Not sure if you’ve already got the news elsewhere but looks like WWE has cancelled the Dec 5 & Dec 6 NXT shows in NZ.
I’m going to see @lakestreetdive in Auckland in January and this is very choice.
@aw_nz @kyhwana check the SSID overhead calculator from revolution wifi. Seems like > 3 SSIDs on 802.11b/g/n might be a bad idea.
@aw_nz @kyhwana yeah I get that, but not sure how that expands to 8! All that time spent broadcasting ssids might give perf hit too.
@aw_nz @kyhwana 8 SSIDs?!? What the hell for!
@hodgman @prairie_home and if you have the capacity watch it on YouTube. Even down here in Middle Earth!
A cold Sunday morning, I’m under a blanket on the couch having a cuddle with the pupper while A Praire Home Companion streams on YouTube.
@kyhwana do you use ubiquiti gear too? I’m a fan of their power/price though no idea about how robust/secure it all is.
@wandaharland @BillBailey is on the twitter, you could ask & see if he replies in the affirmative! Good sir: is your show child friendly?
@GraemeEdgeler yeah it was a number that streamed by in Twitter the other day. Seemed high, was around 1/13 a year or so ago I think.
@GraemeEdgeler is it something like 30 million African American men have been disenfranchised now?
@LewSOS elites fail up, not down?
@mizjwilliams @hadyngreen in terms of availability Boundary Rd have a serviceable light beer at most Countdowns.
@chetibby is stuff cheaper or are people buying less stuff (for the ones with big decreases)? I’m assuming it’s the latter.
@chriskeall That’s buying the saw, paying shipping & GST by the way. Only reason my bud didn’t do it is b/c it was 110V and needed adapter.
@chriskeall Prices in NZ are broken. You can buy an almost identical table-saw in US & ship it here yourself cheaper than buying here.
@chriskeall All that service stuff would be nice indeed; but I’m convinced people purchase online due to price first & foremost.
@hadyngreen We went over Christmas & the beach bar wasn’t open, only poolbar. All bog standard really, very basic. Sunset there is great tho
@hadyngreen For sure! When we went we stayed at this avg but still ok place called Castaways. Buy 2 get 1 free cocktails was the clincher.
@hadyngreen so happy ;) Did you guys get a holiday home or at a resort?
@lingerie_addict @mizjwilliams John Cleese talks about that a bunch in an interview with either Adam Savage or John Hodgman…
Better to let the try happen there than infringe again. Would be penalty try anyway & risk another yellow card. #AllBlacks #ARGvNZL
Justin Marshall can refer to law 20.10d. If ball is at No.8′s feet but scrum not moving the ref will call use-it. #AllBlacks #ARGvNZL
@missgracenz well, it is a breakfast pie, I’m not sure steak & cheese should be eaten after 5am or before 11am :)
@missgracenz B&E? Potato Top? Ugh, Chicken?
@c_mate13 @davemeltzerWON Jesus. Hard to believe RoH could possibly pay enough to justify these guys risking their bodies like that.
@XTOTL holy cow, 5 already!?!
@iainobrien think that was clipping leg of going down? Would have loved to have DRS for it.
@chetibby really?! I always figured that of all FPS style games it would translate to controller perfectly!
@chetibby do you play PC or console version? If PC I’m on every other day or so if you wanna ‘toon up. More chance of winning!
@publicaddress you seen the doco on her on Netflix? Was pretty good watch.
@myleftkidney it’s pretty much a where’s wally situation trying to find Benjen. If we spot him at all it’s just a guess based on half a tail
@MattNippert @LewSOS Cully’s are great, and I’ma let you finish. But Huffmans make one of NZs greatest hot sauces of all time.
Do most people get a community work sentence if they knock a police officer out? Is that first sentence leniency, rich privilege or normal?
@amscraig and nobody knows how to, plus even if you did it’s not as much fun as just building an AI.
@amscraig I watched an interesting computerphile clip on YouTube about AI. The basic problem is you need to work out how to program morality
Hotdang, Burger Fuel’s latest special is very meaty & cheesy. https://t.co/UFbkgVsEJd
@juhasaarinen @publicaddress @chriskeall @nzben @ow 1Gbps at your house kinda just means bottleneck is wifi, then backhaul & Trans-Tasman.
@realkingregal We hope so too! Given your love for reptiles I hope you get a chance to check out our Tuatara’s if you haven’t seen them yet!
@RealKingRegal excuse me, King Regal, Sir, are you coming with your NXT charges to New Zealand this December?
@publicaddress would a manager of chemical programmes exist without meth hysteria?
@alisonhaislip @stonebrewingco You mean you’re late because Alex is busy SAVING LIVES! He’s a veritable hero of the people.
@MiramarMike I think there’s one opposite the sound shell that was ok last time I was there (3 yrs ago!)
@danslevin I think there’s an opt out in the t&c splash, then hidden somewhere in settings.
@sumostevenson plus all the work off the ball means you’re not clearing rucks, setting defence etc.
@sumostevenson trouble is if you resort to that immediately it tells your opponent you’ve given up competing on skill. Then they over did it
@sumostevenson they look good when they focus on simple rugby. Seems like they’ve distracted themselves with intent to niggle.
@jeffcannata I raise you with the Shinsuke Nakamura entrance from the Takeover show yesterday!
@graemeedgeler thought that was a kinda iffy future profit once they sell their stake, and ignores cost of issuing the bonds used to buy.
@Naly_D its cheese & onion dip if you’re doing it properly & it’s delicious.
